decoration.name: Tribal Mask
decoration.description: Hand-carved tribal mask with shell inlay. Ideal for decoration, admiration of other cultures, and display around Halloween.

decoration.name: Owl Board
decoration.description: Images of owls burned into the wood, as a cedar box.

usableobject.name: Orange Slag Hobnail Milkglass Creamer
usableobject.description: A different twist on a kitchen staple. Sure, you could buy a stainless steel creamer. But, why would you? What character does that give to your house?

antique.name: Johnathan Livingstone Seagull Coin
antique.description: This coin is based on the novella that Livingstone wrote.
